itemInfo.itemDesc:
A flare that produces an explosion of brilliant light.

- Stuns nearby enemies for a period of time when used in the Altar of Blood.
â€» Has no effect when used outside of Altar of Blood.

- Cooldown: 2 min

- How to Obtain: Process Dim Origin of Clear Water, Dim Origin of Crimson Flame, Dim Origin of Earth, Ancient Spirit Dust x4 using Simple Alchemy.

item.name: Dim Origin of Clear Water
item.desc:
A sphere that contains ancient cool water that is used to make the Flare of the Ancients.

- Usage: Craft Flare of the Ancients

- Crafting Method: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy

- Crafting Materials: 
Dim Origin of Clear Water x1
Dim Origin of Crimson Flame x1
Dim Origin of Earth x1
Ancient Spirit Dust x4

- How to Obtain: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy with the following materials 
Essence of Nature x2
Powder of Darkness x10

item.name: Dim Origin of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
A sphere that contains ancient scorching flames that is used to make the Flare of the Ancients.

- Usage: Craft Flare of the Ancients

- Crafting Method: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy

- Crafting Materials: 
Dim Origin of Clear Water x1
Dim Origin of Crimson Flame x1
Dim Origin of Earth x1
Ancient Spirit Dust x4

- How to Obtain: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy with the following materials 
Essence of Nature x2
Powder of Flame x10

item.name: Dim Origin of Earth
item.desc:
A sphere that contains ancient soft soil that is used to make the Flare of the Ancients.

- Usage: Craft Flare of the Ancients

- Crafting Method: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy

- Crafting Materials: 
Dim Origin of Clear Water x1
Dim Origin of Crimson Flame x1
Dim Origin of Earth x1
Ancient Spirit Dust x4

- How to Obtain: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy with the following materials 
Essence of Nature x2
Powder of Earth x10

item.name: Ancient Spirit Dust
item.desc:
Dust used to purge black energy.

- Usage: Craft Caphras Stone

- Crafting Method: Processing ({KeyBind:Manufacture}) - Simple Alchemy

- Crafting Materials: 
Ancient Spirit Dust x5
Black Stone x1

- Materials for x10: 
Ancient Spirit Dust x50
Black Stone x10
Black Stone Powder x1

- Materials for x100:
Ancient Spirit Dust x500
Black Stone x100
Pure Powder Reagent x1

- How to Obtain: Quests, defeating monsters, or Gathering
